Package com.independentid.scim.security

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessControl
    AccessControl is based originally upon the Sun Directory server aci (access control instruction) model.
    AccessManager  
    AccessPlugin  
    AciSet
    An AciSet contains a set of ACIs applicable to a specific SCIM path.
    PasswordHandlerPlugin  
    ScimAuthMechanism
    This HttpAuthenticationMechanism enables SCIM to support both Basic and JWT Authentication.
    ScimAuthorizationController  
    ScimBasicIdentityProvider
    This provider supports HTTP Basic Authentication in Quarkus.
    ScimRoleAugmentor
